name: The Office Hopeful
description:
Navigate a stormy corporate climate while holding onto Hope (coffee!) to make it through the day!

This game was made in 24 hours for #ExtraLife2018, and streamed at twitch.ty/ILoveToJam. Please consider donating to Extra Life!

https://www.extra-life.org/index.cfm?fuseaction=donorDrive.team&teamID=40078
